scripts.check:dummy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path='src/config/appConfig.ts';const content=fs.readFileSync(path,'utf8');const m=content.match(/const\s+LOCAL_DUMMY_DATA\s*=\s*(true|false)\s*;/);if(!m){console.error('Missing LOCAL_DUMMY_DATA in '+path);process.exit(1);}if(m[1]==='true'){console.error('LOCAL_DUMMY_DATA is true. Disable before building.');process.exit(1);}console.log('Dummy data disabled for build.');"
scripts.prebuild-check: npm run check:dummy-data && tsc --noEmit && npx expo export --platform ios --output-dir .expo-check --clear && rm -rf .expo-check && echo 'âœ… Pre-build check passed'
scripts.full-rebuild: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx expo run:ios
scripts.version:bump: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const app=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('app.json')); const v=app.expo.version.split('.'); v[2]=parseInt(v[2])+1; app.expo.version=v.join('.'); fs.writeFileSync('app.json',JSON.stringify(app,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('Bumped to '+app.expo.version);"
scripts.build:ios: npm run check:dummy-data && npm run version:bump && npx eas-cli build --platform ios
scripts.build:ios:submit: npm run check:dummy-data && npm run version:bump && npx eas-cli build --platform ios --auto-submit
